segments.source_content:
---
id: tutorial
description: This tutorial will walk you through the basics of the Docusaurus i18n system.
slug: /i18n/tutorial
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # i18n - Tutorial

translations.zh-hant: # 國際化 (i18n) - 教學指南
@@untranslatable_placeholder_71d8dc9b

segments.source_content: This tutorial will walk you through the basics of the **Docusaurus i18n system**.

translations.zh-hant: 本教學將帶您了解 **Docusaurus 國際化系統** 的基本操作。

segments.source_content: We will add **French** translations to a **newly initialized English Docusaurus website**.

translations.zh-hant: 我們將為 **新初始化的英文版 Docusaurus 網站** 新增 **法文** 翻譯。

segments.source_content: Initialize a new site with `npx create-docusaurus@latest website classic` (like [this one](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/examples/classic)).

translations.zh-hant: 使用 `npx create-docusaurus@latest website classic` 初始化新網站（如[此範例](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/examples/classic)）。

segments.source_content: ## Configure your site {#configure-your-site}

translations.zh-hant: ## 設定您的網站 {#configure-your-site}

segments.source_content: Modify `docusaurus.config.js` to add the i18n support for the French language.

translations.zh-hant: 修改 `docusaurus.config.js` 以新增法文語言的國際化支援。

segments.source_content: ### Site configuration {#site-configuration}

translations.zh-hant: ### 網站設定 {#site-configuration}

segments.source_content: Use the [site i18n configuration](./../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#i18n) to declare the i18n locales:

translations.zh-hant: 使用 [網站國際化設定](./../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#i18n) 來宣告國際化語言環境：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_15a1fd96

segments.source_content: The locale names are used for the translation files' locations, as well as your translated locales' base URL. When building all locales, only the default locale will have its name omitted in the base URL.

translations.zh-hant: 語言環境名稱用於翻譯檔案的存放位置，以及翻譯後語言環境的基礎 URL。在建置所有語言環境時，只有預設語言環境的名稱會從基礎 URL 中省略。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus uses the locale names to provide **sensible defaults**: the `<html lang="...">` attribute, locale label, calendar format, etc. You can customize these defaults with the `localeConfigs`.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 使用語言環境名稱提供 **合理的預設值**：`<html lang="...">` 屬性、語言環境標籤、日曆格式等。您可以使用 `localeConfigs` 自訂這些預設值。

segments.source_content: ### Theme configuration {#theme-configuration}

translations.zh-hant: ### 主題設定 {#theme-configuration}

segments.source_content: Add a **navbar item** of type `localeDropdown` so that users can select the locale they want:

translations.zh-hant: 新增一個類型為 `localeDropdown` 的 **導航欄項目**，讓使用者可以選擇他們想要的語言環境：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_3ce8f045

segments.source_content:
:::tip

You can pass a query parameter that will be appended to the URL when a user changes the locale using the dropdown (e.g. `queryString: '?persistLocale=true'`).

This is useful for implementing an automatic locale detection on your server. For example, you can use this parameter to store the user's preferred locale in a cookie.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

您可以傳遞一個查詢參數，當使用者使用下拉選單變更語言環境時，該參數會附加到 URL（例如 `queryString: '?persistLocale=true'`）。

這對於在伺服器上實作自動語言環境偵測非常有用。例如，您可以使用此參數將使用者偏好的語言環境儲存在 cookie 中。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Start your site {#start-your-site}

translations.zh-hant: ### 啟動您的網站 {#start-your-site}

segments.source_content: Start your localized site in dev mode, using the locale of your choice:

translations.zh-hant: 以開發模式啟動您的本地化網站，使用您選擇的語言環境：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run start -- --locale fr
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_092b29bb

segments.source_content: Your site is accessible at [`http://localhost:3000/fr/`](http://localhost:3000/fr/).

translations.zh-hant: 您的網站可透過 [`http://localhost:3000/fr/`](http://localhost:3000/fr/) 存取。

segments.source_content: We haven't provided any translation yet, so the site is mostly untranslated.

translations.zh-hant: 我們尚未提供任何翻譯，因此網站大部分內容仍未翻譯。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Docusaurus provides **default translations** for generic theme labels, such as "Next" and "Previous" for the pagination.

Please help us complete those **[default translations](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-translations/locales)**.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

Docusaurus 為通用主題標籤提供 **預設翻譯**，例如分頁的「Next」和「Previous」。

請協助我們完成這些 **[預設翻譯](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-translations/locales)**。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Each locale is a **distinct standalone single-page application**: it is not possible to start the Docusaurus sites in all locales at the same time.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

每個語言環境都是 **獨立的單頁應用程式**：無法同時啟動所有語言環境的 Docusaurus 網站。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Translate your site {#translate-your-site}

translations.zh-hant: ## 翻譯您的網站 {#translate-your-site}

segments.source_content: All translation data for the French locale is stored in `website/i18n/fr`. Each plugin sources its own translated content under the corresponding folder, while the `code.json` file defines all text labels used in the React code.

translations.zh-hant: 所有法文語言環境的翻譯資料都儲存在 `website/i18n/fr` 中。每個插件在相應的資料夾下提供自己的翻譯內容，而 `code.json` 檔案則定義 React 程式碼中使用的所有文字標籤。

segments.source_content:
:::note

After copying files around, restart your site with `npm run start -- --locale fr`. Hot-reload will work better when editing existing files.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

在複製檔案後，請使用 `npm run start -- --locale fr` 重新啟動您的網站。編輯現有檔案時，熱重載會更順暢。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Translate your React code {#translate-your-react-code}

translations.zh-hant: ### 翻譯您的 React 程式碼 {#translate-your-react-code}

segments.source_content: For any React code you've written yourself: React pages, React components, etc., you will use the [**translation APIs**](../docusaurus-core.mdx#translate).

translations.zh-hant: 對於您自己編寫的任何 React 程式碼：React 頁面、React 元件等，您將使用 [**翻譯 API**](../docusaurus-core.mdx#translate)。

segments.source_content: Locate all text labels in your React code that will be visible to your users, and mark them with the translation APIs. There are two kinds of APIs:

translations.zh-hant: 找出 React 程式碼中所有對使用者可見的文字標籤，並使用翻譯 API 標記它們。有兩種類型的 API：

segments.source_content:
- The `<Translate>` component wraps a string as a JSX element;
- The `translate()` callback takes a message and returns a string.

translations.zh-hant:
- `<Translate>` 元件將字串包裝為 JSX 元素；
- `translate()` 回呼函式接收訊息並回傳字串。

segments.source_content: Use the one that better fits the context semantically. For example, the `<Translate>` can be used as React children, while for props that expect a string, the callback can be used.

translations.zh-hant: 根據語境語義選擇更合適的形式。例如，`<Translate>` 可作為 React 子元素使用，而對於需要字串的 props，則可使用回調函數。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

A JSX element is an _object_, not a string. Using it in contexts expecting strings (such as the children of [`<option>`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/option)) would [coerce it to a string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/toString), which returns `"[object Object]"`. While we encourage you to use `<Translate>` as JSX children, only use the element form when it actually works.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

JSX 元素是_物件_而非字串。在需要字串的上下文中使用（例如 [`<option>`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/option) 的子元素）會[強制轉換為字串](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object/toString)，導致返回 `"[object Object]"`。雖然我們鼓勵將 `<Translate>` 作為 JSX 子元素使用，但請僅在確實適用的情境下使用元素形式。

:::

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
<Tabs>
<TabItem value="Before">
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b474abd5
@@untranslatable_placeholder_f2f9d525

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="After">
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_0029045f
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b5ea89c4

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_eff3427d

segments.source_content:
:::info

Docusaurus provides a **very small and lightweight translation runtime** on purpose, and only supports basic [placeholders interpolation](../docusaurus-core.mdx#interpolate), using a subset of the [ICU Message Format](https://formatjs.io/docs/core-concepts/icu-syntax/).

Most documentation websites are generally **static** and don't need advanced i18n features (**plurals**, **genders**, etc.). Use a library like [react-intl](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-intl) for more advanced use-cases.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

Docusaurus 刻意提供**極簡輕量的翻譯運行時**，僅支援基礎的[佔位符插值](../docusaurus-core.mdx#interpolate)，使用 [ICU 訊息格式](https://formatjs.io/docs/core-concepts/icu-syntax/)的子集。

大多數文檔網站本質上是**靜態的**，無需進階的 i18n 功能（**複數形式**、**性別區分**等）。如需更複雜的用例，請使用 [react-intl](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-intl) 這類函式庫。

:::

segments.source_content: The `docusaurus write-translations` command will statically analyze all React code files used in your site, extract calls to these APIs, and aggregate them in the `code.json` file. The translation files will be stored as maps from IDs to translation message objects (including the translated label and the description of the label). In your calls to the translation APIs (`<Translate>` or `translate()`), you need to specify either the default untranslated message or the ID, in order for Docusaurus to correctly correlate each translation entry to the API call.

translations.zh-hant: `docusaurus write-translations` 命令會靜態分析網站中所有 React 程式碼文件，提取這些 API 的調用，並將其聚合到 `code.json` 文件中。翻譯文件會以從 ID 到翻譯訊息物件（包含翻譯後的標籤和標籤描述）的映射形式儲存。在調用翻譯 API（`<Translate>` 或 `translate()`）時，您需要指定預設未翻譯的訊息或 ID，以便 Docusaurus 正確將每個翻譯條目與 API 調用關聯起來。

segments.source_content: #### Pluralization {#pluralization}

translations.zh-hant: #### 複數形式 {#pluralization}

segments.source_content: When you run `write-translations`, you will notice that some labels are pluralized:

translations.zh-hant: 執行 `write-translations` 時，您會注意到部分標籤具有複數形式：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b73b8545

segments.source_content: Every language will have a list of [possible plural categories](https://unicode-org.github.io/cldr-staging/charts/37/supplemental/language_plural_rules.html). Docusaurus will arrange them in the order of `["zero", "one", "two", "few", "many", "other"]`. For example, because English (`en`) has two plural forms ("one" and "other"), the translation message has two labels separated by a pipe (`|`). For Polish (`pl`) which has three plural forms ("one", "few", and "many"), you would provide three labels in that order, joined by pipes.

translations.zh-hant: 每種語言都有一組[可能的複數類別](https://unicode-org.github.io/cldr-staging/charts/37/supplemental/language_plural_rules.html)。Docusaurus 會按照 `["zero", "one", "two", "few", "many", "other"]` 的順序排列這些類別。例如，由於英語 (`en`) 有兩種複數形式（"one" 和 "other"），翻譯訊息會用管道符 (`|`) 分隔兩個標籤。而波蘭語 (`pl`) 有三種複數形式（"one"、"few" 和 "many"），您需要按順序提供三個用管道符連接的標籤。

segments.source_content: You can pluralize your own code's messages as well:

translations.zh-hant: 您也可以為自己的程式碼訊息實現複數化：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_63d9cf48

segments.source_content:
:::note

Docusaurus uses [`Intl.PluralRules`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/PluralRules) to resolve and select plural forms. It is important to provide the right number of plural forms in the right order for `selectMessage` to work.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

Docusaurus 使用 [`Intl.PluralRules`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/PluralRules) 來解析和選擇複數形式。為了讓 `selectMessage` 正常運作，必須按正確順序提供正確數量的複數形式。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Translate plugin data {#translate-plugin-data}

translations.zh-hant: ### 翻譯插件數據 {#translate-plugin-data}

segments.source_content: JSON translation files are used for everything that is interspersed in your code:

translations.zh-hant: JSON 翻譯文件用於處理程式碼中所有需要國際化的內容：

segments.source_content:
- React code, including the translated labels you have marked above
- Navbar and footer labels in theme config
- Docs sidebar category labels in `sidebars.js`
- Blog sidebar title in plugin options
- ...

translations.zh-hant:
- React 程式碼，包括您標記過的翻譯標籤
- 主題配置中的導覽列和頁尾標籤
- `sidebars.js` 中的文檔側邊欄分類標籤
- 部落格外掛選項中的側邊欄標題
- ...

segments.source_content: Run the [write-translations](../cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) command:

translations.zh-hant: 執行 [write-translations](../cli.mdx#docusaurus-write-translations-sitedir) 指令：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run write-translations -- --locale fr
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_88b052dd

segments.source_content: It will extract and initialize the JSON translation files that you need to translate. The `code.json` file at the root includes all translation API calls extracted from the source code, which could either be written by you or provided by the themes, some of which may already be translated by default.

translations.zh-hant: 該指令會提取並初始化您需要翻譯的 JSON 翻譯文件。根目錄下的 `code.json` 包含從原始碼中提取的所有翻譯 API 呼叫，這些可能是您編寫的或由主題提供的，其中部分可能已預設翻譯完成。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ebc7af28

segments.source_content: Plugins and themes will also write their own JSON translation files, such as:

translations.zh-hant: 外掛和主題也會生成自己的 JSON 翻譯文件，例如：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_1c0c7d50

segments.source_content: Translate the `message` attribute in the JSON files of `i18n/fr`, and your site layout and homepage should now be translated.

translations.zh-hant: 翻譯 `i18n/fr` 中 JSON 文件的 `message` 屬性後，您的網站佈局和首頁現在應該已完成翻譯。

segments.source_content: ### Translate Markdown files {#translate-markdown-files}

translations.zh-hant: ### 翻譯 Markdown 文件 {#translate-markdown-files}

segments.source_content: Official Docusaurus content plugins extensively use Markdown/MDX files and allow you to translate them.

translations.zh-hant: 官方 Docusaurus 內容外掛廣泛使用 Markdown/MDX 文件，並允許您對其進行翻譯。

segments.source_content: #### Translate the docs {#translate-the-docs}

translations.zh-hant: #### 翻譯文檔 {#translate-the-docs}

segments.source_content: Copy your docs Markdown files from `docs/` to `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current`, and translate them:

translations.zh-hant: 將您的文檔 Markdown 文件從 `docs/` 複製到 `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current` 並進行翻譯：

segments.source_content:
```bash
mkdir -p i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current
cp -r docs/** i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_371e39a0

segments.source_content:
:::info

Notice that the `docusaurus-plugin-content-docs` plugin always divides its content by versions. The data in `./docs` folder will be translated in the `current` subfolder and `current.json` file. See [the doc versioning guide](../guides/docs/versioning.mdx#terminology) for more information about what "current" means.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

請注意，`docusaurus-plugin-content-docs` 外掛總是按版本劃分內容。`./docs` 文件夾中的數據會在 `current` 子文件夾和 `current.json` 文件中進行翻譯。有關 "current" 含義的更多信息，請參閱[文檔版本控制指南](../guides/docs/versioning.mdx#terminology)。

:::

segments.source_content: #### Translate the blog {#translate-the-blog}

translations.zh-hant: #### 翻譯部落格 {#translate-the-blog}

segments.source_content: Copy your blog Markdown files to `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog`, and translate them:

translations.zh-hant: 將您的部落格 Markdown 文件複製到 `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog` 並進行翻譯：

segments.source_content:
```bash
mkdir -p i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog
cp -r blog/** i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_9f4bf2e5

segments.source_content: #### Translate the pages {#translate-the-pages}

translations.zh-hant: #### 翻譯頁面 {#translate-the-pages}

segments.source_content: Copy your pages Markdown files to `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-pages`, and translate them:

translations.zh-hant: 將您的頁面 Markdown 文件複製到 `i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-pages` 並進行翻譯：

segments.source_content:
```bash
mkdir -p i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-pages
cp -r src/pages/**.md i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-pages
cp -r src/pages/**.mdx i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-pages
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5de6a9e7

segments.source_content:
:::warning

We only copy `.md` and `.mdx` files, as React pages are translated through JSON translation files already.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

我們只複製 `.md` 和 `.mdx` 文件，因為 React 頁面已經通過 JSON 翻譯文件完成翻譯。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Use explicit heading IDs]

By default, a Markdown heading `### Hello World` will have a generated ID `hello-world`. Other documents can link it with `[link](#hello-world)`. However, after translation, the heading becomes `### Bonjour le Monde`, with ID `bonjour-le-monde`.

Generated IDs are not always a good fit for localized sites, as it requires you to localize all the anchor links:

```diff
- [link](#hello-world).
+ [link](#bonjour-le-monde)
```

For localized sites, it is recommended to use **[explicit heading IDs](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-toc.mdx#heading-ids)**.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[使用明確的標題 ID]

預設情況下，Markdown 標題 `### Hello World` 會自動生成 ID `hello-world`。其他文件可以透過 `[連結](#hello-world)` 來引用它。然而，翻譯後標題變為 `### Bonjour le Monde`，ID 也變為 `bonjour-le-monde`。

自動生成的 ID 並不總是適合本地化網站，因為這要求你本地化所有錨點連結：

```diff
- [連結](#hello-world)。
+ [連結](#bonjour-le-monde)
```

對於本地化網站，建議使用 **[明確的標題 ID](../guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-toc.mdx#heading-ids)**。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Deploy your site {#deploy-your-site}

translations.zh-hant: ## 部署你的網站 {#deploy-your-site}

segments.source_content: You can choose to deploy your site under a **single domain** or use **multiple (sub)domains**.

translations.zh-hant: 你可以選擇在 **單一網域** 下部署網站，或使用 **多個（子）網域**。

segments.source_content: ### Single-domain deployment {#single-domain-deployment}

translations.zh-hant: ### 單一網域部署 {#single-domain-deployment}

segments.source_content: Run the following command:

translations.zh-hant: 執行以下指令：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run build
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a320d8a8

segments.source_content: Docusaurus will build **one single-page application per locale**:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 會為每個語言版本 **建立一個單頁應用程式**：

segments.source_content:
- `website/build`: for the default, English language
- `website/build/fr`: for the French language

translations.zh-hant:
- `website/build`：預設的英文版本
- `website/build/fr`：法文版本

segments.source_content: You can now [deploy](../deployment.mdx) the `build` folder to the static hosting solution of your choice.

translations.zh-hant: 現在你可以將 `build` 資料夾 [部署](../deployment.mdx) 到你選擇的靜態託管服務。

segments.source_content:
:::note

The Docusaurus website uses this strategy:

- [`https://docusaurus.io`](https://docusaurus.io)
- [`https://docusaurus.io/fr`](https://docusaurus.io/fr)

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

Docusaurus 官方網站採用此策略：

- [`https://docusaurus.io`](https://docusaurus.io)
- [`https://docusaurus.io/fr`](https://docusaurus.io/fr)

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Static hosting providers generally redirect `/unknown/url` to `/404.html` by convention, always showing an **English 404 page**.

**Localize your 404 pages** by configuring your host to redirect `/fr/*` to `/fr/404.html`.

This is not always possible, and depends on your host: GitHub Pages can't do this, [Netlify](https://docs.netlify.com/routing/redirects/redirect-options/#custom-404-page-handling) can.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

靜態託管服務通常會將 `/unknown/url` 重新導向至 `/404.html`，這會顯示 **英文的 404 頁面**。

若要 **本地化你的 404 頁面**，請設定你的託管服務將 `/fr/*` 重新導向至 `/fr/404.html`。

這並非總是可行，取決於你的託管服務：GitHub Pages 無法做到，但 [Netlify](https://docs.netlify.com/routing/redirects/redirect-options/#custom-404-page-handling) 可以。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Multi-domain deployment {#multi-domain-deployment}

translations.zh-hant: ### 多網域部署 {#multi-domain-deployment}

segments.source_content: You can also build your site for a single locale:

translations.zh-hant: 你也可以為單一語言版本建立網站：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run build -- --locale fr
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_33d86a40

segments.source_content: Docusaurus will not add the `/fr/` URL prefix.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 不會添加 `/fr/` 網址前綴。

segments.source_content: On your [static hosting provider](../deployment.mdx):

translations.zh-hant: 在你的 [靜態託管服務](../deployment.mdx) 上：

segments.source_content:
- create one deployment per locale
- configure the appropriate build command, using the `--locale` option
- configure the (sub)domain of your choice for each deployment

translations.zh-hant:
- 為每個語言版本建立一個部署
- 設定適當的建置指令，使用 `--locale` 選項
- 為每個部署設定你選擇的（子）網域

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This strategy is **not possible** with GitHub Pages, as it is only possible to **have a single deployment**.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

此策略 **無法** 在 GitHub Pages 上使用，因為它 **僅支援單一部署**。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Hybrid {#hybrid}

translations.zh-hant: ### 混合部署 {#hybrid}

segments.source_content: It is possible to have some locales using sub-paths, and others using subdomains.

translations.zh-hant: 可以讓部分語言版本使用子路徑，其他則使用子網域。

segments.source_content: It is also possible to deploy each locale as a separate subdomain, assemble the subdomains in a single unified domain at the CDN level:

translations.zh-hant: 也可以將每個語言版本部署為獨立的子網域，並在 CDN 層級將子網域組合成單一統一的網域：

segments.source_content:
- Deploy your site as `fr.docusaurus.io`
- Configure a CDN to serve it from `docusaurus.io/fr`

translations.zh-hant:
- 將你的網站部署為 `fr.docusaurus.io`
- 設定 CDN 從 `docusaurus.io/fr` 提供服務

segments.source_content: ## Managing translations {#managing-translations}

translations.zh-hant: ## 管理翻譯 {#managing-translations}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus doesn't care about how you manage your translations: all it needs is that all translation files (JSON, Markdown, or other data files) are available in the file system during building. However, as site creators, you would need to consider how translations are managed so your translation contributors could collaborate well.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 不關心你如何管理翻譯：它只需要所有翻譯檔案（JSON、Markdown 或其他資料檔案）在建置期間存在於檔案系統中。然而，作為網站創建者，你需要考慮如何管理翻譯，以便翻譯貢獻者能有效協作。

segments.source_content: We will share two common translation collaboration strategies: [**using git**](./i18n-git.mdx) and [**using Crowdin**](./i18n-crowdin.mdx).

translations.zh-hant: 我們將分享兩種常見的翻譯協作策略：[**使用 git**](./i18n-git.mdx) 和 [**使用 Crowdin**](./i18n-crowdin.mdx)。
